ditwahLandslide 1.1.0
  • Reference

Heatmap of Transitions Between Landslide Warning Levels

viz_landslide_warnings_from_to.Rd

Temporal progression of landslide warning state

Usage

viz_landslide_warnings_from_to(
  district,
  province,
  interactivity = TRUE,
  data = ditwah_landslides_warnings,
  ang = 90
)

Arguments

district

District name

province

Province name

interactivity

if TRUE interactive plot will be generated, if FALSE static plot will be generated

data

name of the dataset, by default ditwah_landslides_warnings

ang

angle of the x-axis lables

Value

Heatmap plot of landslide warnings

Author

Thiyanga S. Talagala, Geethma R. Jayasinghe, Y. M. Amali P. Rajapaksha

On this page

Developed by Thiyanga S. Talagala, Geethma R. Jayasinghe, Y. M. Amali P. Rajapaksha, N. G. Shehara Minimuthu, Y. G. D. M. Savindya Thathsarani.
